member.name: T:RpsApi.Controllers.AuthController
member.summary: Controller for authentication and authorization of users.

member.name: M:RpsApi.Controllers.AuthController.#ctor(RpsApi.Models.Interfaces.IServices.IAuthService)
member.summary: Controller for authentication and authorization of users.

member.name: M:RpsApi.Controllers.AuthController.PostRegister(RpsApi.Models.DataTransferObjects.FrontModels.RegisterRequest)
member.returns: Response with an access token and a refresh token.
member.response: User with that username already exists.

member.name: M:RpsApi.Controllers.AuthController.PostLogin(RpsApi.Models.DataTransferObjects.FrontModels.LoginRequest)
member.returns: Response with an access token and a refresh token.
member.response: User with that username does not exist or password is incorrect.

member.name: M:RpsApi.Controllers.AuthController.PostRefreshToken(RpsApi.Models.DataTransferObjects.FrontModels.RefreshRequest)
member.param: Request with a still valid refresh token and an expired access token.
member.returns: Response with a new access token and a new refresh token.
member.response: User with that username does not exist
Refresh and/or access token is invalid.

member.name: M:RpsApi.Controllers.AuthController.DeleteLogout(RpsApi.Models.DataTransferObjects.FrontModels.LogoutRequest)
member.summary: Logs the user out, revokes refresh token from a specific device or all devices if no device id is provided.
member.param: Request with a device id to revoke refresh token from.
member.returns: True if the refresh token was revoked successfully.
member.response: User with that username does not exist.

member.name: M:RpsApi.Controllers.AuthController.GetUser(System.Int32)
member.param: ID of the user to get data from.

member.name: M:RpsApi.Controllers.AuthController.PutMe(RpsApi.Models.DataTransferObjects.FrontModels.UserEditRequest)
member.returns: True if the user data was edited successfully.
member.response: User with that username or email already exists.

member.name: M:RpsApi.Controllers.AuthController.DeleteMe
member.summary: Deletes currently logged-in user. Revokes all refresh tokens.
member.returns: Response with a message if the user was deleted successfully.

member.name: M:RpsApi.Controllers.AuthController.GetSearch(RpsApi.Models.DataTransferObjects.FrontModels.UserSearchRequest)
member.summary: Searches for users by username or email.
